scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev"
scripts.setup:python: python3 -m venv backend/ia/venv && backend/ia/venv/bin/pip install -r backend/ia/requirements.txt
scripts.postinstall: echo '\nðŸ“¦ Run \"npm run setup:python\" to install Python dependencies\n'
